sentences.sContent: The way to bring cost down is to industrialise much of the process.
sentences.sContent_eng: The way to bring cost down is to industrialise much of the process.
sentences.sCn: 降低成本的方法是将这个过程的大部分工业化。

sentences.sContent: It took the west 300 years to industrialise and build a mature society with strong institutions. And even now serious inequalities and social tension remain.
sentences.sContent_eng: It took the west 300 years to industrialise and build a mature society with strong institutions. And even now serious inequalities and social tension remain.
sentences.sCn: 西方花了300年来完成工业化，建立起强大制度构建的成熟社会，而甚至到现在严峻的不平等和社会紧张依然存在。

words.tran: 工业的，产业的；从事工业的；供工业用的；来自勤劳的
实业家；工业家；产业工人
产业主义，工业主义；工业制度
使工业化；将…组成产业（industrialize的过去分词）
